Name: Ice White Cosmo
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS flamed orange zest twist over cocktail, then use as garnish.
Review: Recognisably from the Cosmo family but wonderfully different.
History: Created in 2004 by yours truly, London, England. See: More cocktails by Simon Difford
Nutrition: One serving of Ice White Cosmo contains 214 calories
